rafa.message: Your restless sleep was around your average. A wind down routine may help to lower your restless sleep overall. Try it tonight!
rafa.heartRateMsg: A lower heart rate generally means your heart is working more efficiently. That's great news!
rafa.heartRateVariabilityMsg: Your heart rate variability was in the high range. This is generally good, and helps you feel energized, good work!
rafa.breathRateMsg: Don't take it for granted! A breath rate around your average is good for your SleepIQ® score.

miki.message: Nice job! You had fewer bed exits than your average, which may help you achieve your sleep goal more often.
miki.heartRateMsg: A lower heart rate generally means your heart is working more efficiently. That's great news!
miki.heartRateVariabilityMsg: Way to go, your HRV is in the high range! High HRV may indicate better overall performance of your heart and nervous system.
miki.breathRateMsg: Don't take it for granted! A breath rate around your average is good for your SleepIQ® score.
